name: DOWN TO TENEBRIS III
description:
Sinopsis:

You woke up at the office where you work after falling asleep.  There is nobody else in the building except your fear of darkness. 

Find the exit running through the different floors before the lights turn off.

Controls:
AD: For movement
Space: Climb
Left Shift: Run
Left Shift+Space: Pass through an obstacle

Credits:

  • Fangano Juan Ignacio
